product_summary: ConvoStack is designed for developers to easily embed a customizable AI ChatBot widget into a website with as little as a few lines of code, completely for free! Offer your users full support conversations in plain English, powered by the Langchain framework with an option to add your own AI model.
product_pros: Easy to embed with minimal code
Supports popular frameworks like Express and React
Integrates with your own AI model using LangChain
Type-safe and utilizes GraphQL for efficient data retrieval

product_usecases.details: ConvoStack can be used to provide 24/7 customer support on your website, answering common questions and resolving issues.
The chatbot can engage with website visitors, qualify leads, and collect information for your sales team.
ConvoStack can be integrated with your product to provide interactive demonstrations and answer customer questions.
The chatbot can assist users with scheduling appointments or consultations, freeing up your staff for other tasks.
ConvoStack can leverage your AI model to provide personalized recommendations to users based on their preferences and behavior.

product_toolfor.details: ConvoStack provides a developer-friendly framework for building and customizing AI chatbots.
Businesses can use ConvoStack to enhance their customer service, lead generation, and sales efforts.
Entrepreneurs can leverage ConvoStack to quickly and easily add AI chatbot functionality to their websites.
Students can use ConvoStack to learn about and experiment with AI chatbot development.
Researchers can use ConvoStack as a platform for developing and testing new AI chatbot models.
